Require Import Coq.Arith.PeanoNat.
   Inductive nat := | O: nat | S (n: nat): nat.
  Fixpoint add (n m: nat): nat :=   match n with   | O => m   | S n' => S (add n' m)   end.
  Fixpoint mul (n m: nat): nat :=   match n with   | O => O   | S p => add m (mul p m)   end.
  Theorem add_assoc:   forall n m p, add n (add m p) = add (add n m) p.
 Proof.
 Admitted.
  Theorem mul_add_distr_r:   forall n m p, mul (add n m) p = add (mul n p) (mul m p).
